allow:
Bash(find app/src/main/java/com/blockforge/moderex -name "*.java" -type f -exec sed -i -E '
# remove javadoc class/interface comments \(/** ... */\)
/\\/\\*\\*/,/\\*\\// {
    /\\/\\*\\*/d
    /\\*\\//d
    /\\*/d
}
# remove some common inline comment patterns
s/\\/\\/ Check all possible plugin names//g
s/\\/\\/ permission checked per subcommand//g
s/\\/\\/ Generate test replay at player.s location//g
s/\\/\\/ Open replay browser GUI//g
s/\\/\\/ Count active recordings//g
s/\\/\\/ Generate token//g
s/\\/\\/ Revoke token and invalidate all sessions//g
s/\\/\\/ Open chest GUI//g
s/\\/\\/ Set viewer and build before registering//g
s/\\/\\/ Register the GUI BEFORE opening inventory//g
s/\\/\\/ Open the inventory//g
s/\\/\\/ ALWAYS cancel the event first when a GUI is open to prevent item theft//g
s/\\/\\/ Verify it.s the same inventory \\\(top inventory of the view\\\)//g
s/\\/\\/ Only process clicks within the GUI inventory \\\(not player.s inventory at bottom\\\)//g
s/\\/\\/ Use ConcurrentHashMap for thread safety//g
s/\\/\\/ Grim can register under different names depending on version//g
s/\\/\\/ Try multiple possible API package locations//g
s/\\/\\/ Get the Grim flag event class via reflection//g
s/\\/\\/ eventClass already set above//g
s/\\/\\/ Create an event executor that handles the event via reflection//g
s/\\/\\/ Register the event dynamically//g
s/\\/\\/ Try ViolationEvent \\\(newer Grim versions\\\)//g
s/\\/\\/ Try next class//g
s/\\/\\/ Silently ignore reflection errors//g
s/\\/\\/ Extract data from the event using reflection//g
s/\\/\\/ Get check name//g
s/\\/\\/ Try to get player and check info from alternative event types//g
s/\\/\\/ Try different method names//g
s/\\/\\/ Try to get check name//g
s/\\/\\/ Try to get violations//g
' {} ;)
